original_title: Clifford's Puppy Days: New Friends, Little Puppy, Big Adventures
overview: Clifford, the precocious, adorably oversized animated dog (from the popular television series) is a huge favorite of kids from ages 2 to 5. The action here commences when Clifford is just a cute little red bundle of fur. In this episode, a young Clifford discovers how to have some raucous fun in the new (to him) neighborhood.
title: Clifford's Puppy Days: New Friends, Little Puppy, Big Adventures
